title: Understanding Workbook Merging
text: When merging workbooks, consider the security settings of each workbook. If they have different passwords, it might affect the merging process.

title: Password Protection in Workbooks
text: Workbooks with different passwords have separate security settings. Think about how this might impact the ability to merge them.

title: Can workbooks with different passwords be merged?
text: Consider the security implications of merging workbooks with different passwords.
